Energy Club IITB

An image of a plug

Technology

In this era, Technology have all the possible solutions for our problems. At Energy Club we are kind of obsessed with the leading edge technology which will shape our future. We like to discuss and learn about the need and possibilities of Technologies known.

An image of a leaf

Environment

Topics of Energy can never be seperated from its impact on environment, it is a key component for the sustainable future. With human pushing nature's carrying capacity to its limits, we try to understand the delicate balance and urgency of climate change.

An image of a rupee

Economics

Everything revolves around Economics. Every policy and pact has its own impact at it. Here at Energy club, we like to discuss recent policies, rules, strategies and decisions made by countries in Energy and environment sector and how it affects us.

“We are the first generation to be able to end poverty and the last generation that can take steps to avoid the worst impact of climate change. ”


Ban Ki-moon

Secretary General of the United Nations

About

Energy Club, IIT Bombay is a student organization started by students of the Department of Energy Science and Engineering, bringing energy conservation and sustainable development enthusiasts under one roof.
